column17:
Check out this pair of snazzy sneakers by Roxy which can entice the youth at first glance. The funky colour combination makes it look all the more peppy. The interiors have a soothing footbed and collars which offer round the clock comfort to your feet. The durable rubber outsole is slip-resistant and keeps your feet protected all the while.

Style it up with jeans and T-shirt for a casual outing with friends.

Product Features
Material: Canvas
Colour: Black
Style: Laced

Care Tip
Clean a canvas shoe with mild detergent and a soft nylon bristle brush or as guided by the manufacturer.
